fact.description: The match is underway in Manaus.
Portugal have a goal kick.
Ball safe as USA is awarded a throw-in in their half.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Portugal.
Throw-in for Portugal in their own half.
USA awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to USA.
Portugal take a 0-1 lead thanks to Nani.
Portugal have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to USA in their own half.
Fabian Johnson (USA) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Nestor Pitana signals a USA throw-in in Portugal's half.
Throw-in for USA at Arena Amazonia.
Corner awarded to USA.
Free kick USA.
USA's Clint Dempsey misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Portugal at Arena Amazonia.
Raul Meireles is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Eder (Portugal) has replaced the possibly injured Helder Postiga.
Play has been resumed.
Raul Meireles is back on the pitch.
USA drive forward and Clint Dempsey gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to USA.
USA's Clint Dempsey breaks free at Arena Amazonia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Portugal goal kick.
Portugal have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Portugal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in USA's half?
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Portugal in their own half.
Throw-in Portugal.
Portugal are pushing forward but Joao Moutinho's finish is wide of the goal.
Nestor Pitana awards USA a goal kick.
Throw-in for Portugal in their own half.
Free kick Portugal.
USA are coming forward and Michael Bradley gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Nestor Pitana awards Portugal a goal kick.
Ball safe as USA is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ball goes out of play for a USA goal kick.
Clint Dempsey (USA) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
USA have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
USA to take a throw-in in Portugal territory.
Michael Bradley of USA gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Portugal at Arena Amazonia.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Portugal in their own half.
Portugal have a goal kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a Portugal throw-in in USA's half.
In Manaus USA attack through Fabian Johnson. The finish is off target, however.
Can Portugal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in USA's half?
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
Miguel Veloso (Portugal) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Manaus Portugal's Cristiano Ronaldo is caught offside.
USA's Jermaine Jones gets in a shot on goal at Arena Amazonia. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Cristiano Ronaldo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Portugal.
Nestor Pitana blows against USA's Fabian Johnson for offside.
Attention is being given to USA’s Jermaine Jones and play has been suspended briefly.
Jermaine Jones has recovered and rejoins the match in Manaus.
The match at Arena Amazonia is underway again.
Free kick in a good position for Portugal!
Portugal's Nani is on target but unsuccessful.
Portugal's Cristiano Ronaldo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
USA have a goal kick.
USA to take a throw-in in Portugal territory.
Can USA get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portugal's half?
Nani hits the post! Very nearly a goal there for Portugal!
Eder for Portugal drives towards goal at Arena Amazonia. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Portugal.
Cristiano Ronaldo (Portugal) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a USA goal kick.
Throw-in for USA at Arena Amazonia.
USA to take a throw-in in Portugal territory.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Portugal in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the first half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Portugal in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Arena Amazonia.
Portugal make their second substitution with William Carvalho replacing Andre Almeida.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
Important block from the USA defence as Cristiano Ronaldo fires in a strike for Portugal.
Portugal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eder for Portugal gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Nestor Pitana awards USA a goal kick.
Fabian Johnson of USA smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
USA have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Goal kick for USA at Arena Amazonia.
Nestor Pitana signals a Portugal throw-in in USA's half.
Portugal's Eder gets in a shot but it is blocked by a USA defender.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to USA in their own half.
The match in Manaus is underway once more.
Portugal have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Nestor Pitana signals a Portugal throw-in in USA's half.
Portugal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Portugal awarded a free kick in their own half.
USA push forward at Arena Amazonia and Michael Bradley gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Portugal defence.
Corner awarded to USA.
Nestor Pitana awards Portugal a goal kick.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to USA in their own half.
In Manaus, Jermaine Jones of USA is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Can USA get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portugal's half?
USA drive upfield and Kyle Beckerman gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Portugal defender.
Portugal's Cristiano Ronaldo breaks free at Arena Amazonia. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a USA goal kick.
USA have been awarded a corner by Nestor Pitana.
Jermaine Jones grabs a goal to bring things level at 1-1 at Arena Amazonia.
Goal kick for USA at Arena Amazonia.
USA have a goal kick.
Portugal push forward through Raul Meireles, whose finish on goal is saved.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Portugal close to the penalty box.
Portugal drive forward but Raul Meireles is judged offside.
Paulo Bento (Portugal) is making a third substitution, with Silvestre Varela replacing Raul Meireles.
Portugal to take a throw-in in USA territory.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to USA in their own half.
Goal kick for Portugal at Arena Amazonia.
Ball goes out of play for a USA goal kick.
Jurgen Klinsmann is making the team's first substitution at Arena Amazonia with DeAndre Yedlin replacing Alejandro Bedoya.
Portugal's Cristiano Ronaldo is whistled for offside at Arena Amazonia.
Nestor Pitana signals a Portugal throw-in in USA's half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Portugal in their own half.
Nestor Pitana signals a free kick to Portugal.
Jermaine Jones for USA has been booked by Nestor Pitana and receives a first yellow card.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
USA awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Matt Besler for USA who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Nestor Pitana has blown to resume play in Manaus.
USA's Matt Besler looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In Manaus Portugal attack through Nani. The finish is off target, however.
USA have a goal kick.
Graham Zusi with an assist there.
Eder (Portugal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
DaMarcus Beasley is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Throw-in for USA at Arena Amazonia.
The match is underway again.
Portugal needs to be cautious. USA have an attacking throw-in.
DaMarcus Beasley is back on his feet again.
Free kick Portugal.
Nestor Pitana blows against Portugal's Cristiano Ronaldo for offside.
Chris Wondolowski is on a sub for Clint Dempsey for USA.
Corner awarded to Portugal.
Portugal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Cristiano Ronaldo's header is off-target for Portugal.
Nestor Pitana awards USA a goal kick.
Throw-in USA.
Portugal are pushing forward but Bruno Alves's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a USA goal kick.
Omar Gonzalez is on a sub for Graham Zusi for USA.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the second half.
Portugal attack but Cristiano Ronaldo's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for USA at Arena Amazonia.
Throw-in for Portugal in their own half.
Cristiano Ronaldo instrumental with a fine assist.
Nestor Pitana blows to end the match. The final score is 2-2.
